title: Austin Cooking Classes For Fun/Beginners/Intermediate
description: Are you new to cooking? Do you want to learn to make something new? Or are you just looking for some fun activities? Or even better, do you want to learn to make something and sell and make money? Worry not, this is the group for you! We will have different themes of cooking classes taught by different cooking professionals, just join us and stay tuned and we will keep you in the loop!

title: Let's cook together! social cooking experience
description: Wanna learn authentic recipes straight from the source? Looking for a fun interactive event? Got a date you wanna impress? New in town and need to meet people?Join us as one of our native home cooks or experts reveals secrets that produce that authentic flavor! Not only will you learn how it's done, but you will be a part of the process! Tasty meal, new skills, fun company and great memories guaranteed!
